casebody.data:
GERDA V. YOUNG (formerly Gerda V. Schaeffer), and ALFRED YOUNG, her husband, v. ODEN A. SCHAEFFER. 22 So. (2nd) 252

January Term, 1945

April 27, 1945 Division A As Amended on Rehearing: May 15, 1945 Galen & Cleveland, for petitioners. George H. Salley and Arnold A: Ross, for respondent. *888PER CURIAM:

Petition for certiorari is granted and the final decree of the circuit court is quashed but with leave to amend if desired. See Straus v. Straus, 148 Fla. 23, 3 So. (2nd) 727; Kollar v. Kollar, 155 Fla. 705, 21 So. (2nd) 356.

CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BUFORD and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
